sentences.sContent: Some snakes move with deceptive speed (= move faster than you think or expect ) .
sentences.sCn: 有些蛇的爬行速度出乎意料地快。

sentences.sContent: Gwen’s students may look angelic, but appearances can be deceptive .
sentences.sCn: 格温的学生也许看起来像天使，不过人不可貌相。

trans.tranOther: something that is deceptive seems to be one thing but is in fact very different
